snippet.title: Monster cash jackpot reaches $195,000
snippet.content:
Love your NRL SuperCoach? Register and play Perfect 8 - it's FREE - it's worth $195,000!!! It takes no time at all to select your eight players from all eight matches of the round for your chance to win. You need to select the top SuperCoach points scorer in each match to collect the catch.
This season we've had several players land five out of eight so it's just a matter of time before the JACKPOT goes off. It might as well be you! Perfect 8 It's the perfect partner for SuperCoach Classic. If you are you a commitment-phobe or don't have the patience for a full SuperCoach season, then Perfect 8 is the best option for you (aside from ) Perfect 8 is just like bingo for NRL - all you have to do is select the top SuperCoach NRL points-scorer in each of the eight matches in that the round to collect the cash. If no-one lands 8-8, the prize jackpots $5000 (except bye rounds). That's some serious cash for fantasy rugby league!
